size.description: A checkbox can vary in size.
size.name: size

slot.description:
A slot name for the component. Slots allow the component to receive props from a parent component.
An explicit `null` value indicates that the local props completely override all props received from a parent.
slot.name: slot

style.description: The inline [style](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/HTMLElement/style) for the element. A function may be provided to compute the style based on component state.
style.name: style

children.description: The children of the component. A function may be provided to alter the children based on component state.
children.name: children

validationBehavior.description:
Whether to use native HTML form validation to prevent form submission
when the value is missing or invalid, or mark the field as required
or invalid via ARIA.
validationBehavior.name: validationBehavior

isIndeterminate.description:
Indeterminism is presentational only.
The indeterminate visual representation remains regardless of user interaction.
isIndeterminate.name: isIndeterminate

defaultSelected.description: Whether the element should be selected (uncontrolled).
defaultSelected.name: defaultSelected

isSelected.description: Whether the element should be selected (controlled).
isSelected.name: isSelected

onChange.description: Handler that is called when the element's selection state changes.
onChange.name: onChange

value.description: The value of the input element, used when submitting an HTML form. See [MDN](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTML/Element/input#htmlattrdefvalue).
value.name: value

isReadOnly.description: Whether the input can be selected but not changed by the user.
isReadOnly.name: isReadOnly

isRequired.description: Whether user input is required on the input before form submission.
isRequired.name: isRequired

isInvalid.description: Whether the input value is invalid.
isInvalid.name: isInvalid

validate.description:
A function that returns an error message if a given value is invalid.
Validation errors are displayed to the user when the form is submitted
if `validationBehavior="native"`. For realtime validation, use the `isInvalid`
prop instead.
validate.name: validate

autoFocus.description: Whether the element should receive focus on render.
autoFocus.name: autoFocus

onFocus.description: Handler that is called when the element receives focus.
onFocus.name: onFocus

onBlur.description: Handler that is called when the element loses focus.
onBlur.name: onBlur

onFocusChange.description: Handler that is called when the element's focus status changes.
onFocusChange.name: onFocusChange

onKeyDown.description: Handler that is called when a key is pressed.
onKeyDown.name: onKeyDown

onKeyUp.description: Handler that is called when a key is released.
onKeyUp.name: onKeyUp

aria-controls.description: Identifies the element (or elements) whose contents or presence are controlled by the current element.
aria-controls.name: aria-controls

excludeFromTabOrder.description:
Whether to exclude the element from the sequential tab order. If true,
the element will not be focusable via the keyboard by tabbing. This should
be avoided except in rare scenarios where an alternative means of accessing
the element or its functionality via the keyboard is available.
excludeFromTabOrder.name: excludeFromTabOrder

aria-label.description: Defines a string value that labels the current element.
aria-label.name: aria-label

aria-labelledby.description: Identifies the element (or elements) that labels the current element.
aria-labelledby.name: aria-labelledby

aria-describedby.description: Identifies the element (or elements) that describes the object.
aria-describedby.name: aria-describedby

aria-details.description: Identifies the element (or elements) that provide a detailed, extended description for the object.
aria-details.name: aria-details

aria-errormessage.description: Identifies the element that provides an error message for the object.
aria-errormessage.name: aria-errormessage

name.description: The name of the input element, used when submitting an HTML form. See [MDN](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTML/Element/input#htmlattrdefname).
name.name: name

inputRef.description: A ref for the HTML input element.
inputRef.name: inputRef

onHoverStart.description: Handler that is called when a hover interaction starts.
onHoverStart.name: onHoverStart

onHoverEnd.description: Handler that is called when a hover interaction ends.
onHoverEnd.name: onHoverEnd

onHoverChange.description: Handler that is called when the hover state changes.
onHoverChange.name: onHoverChange

className.description: The CSS [className](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/Element/className) for the element. A function may be provided to compute the class based on component state.
className.name: className

size.name: size
